comments.name: Homer
comments.comment: Hey, Apu, you got that new beer with candy floating in it... Skittlebrau?

comments.name: Apu
comments.comment: No such product exists sir. You must have dreamt it.

comments.name: Homer
comments.comment: Well then, just gimme a six pack and a bag of Skittles.
